overview:
Prior to joining Sverica International, Mr. David Finley served as a senior manager at The Parthenon Group, a strategy consulting firm, where he provided advisory services to private equity, mid-market and Fortune 1000 clients. His assignments at Parthenon included acquisition target due diligence, operational improvement, pricing studies, customer segmentation, and business unit growth strategies across a wide variety of industries.

Prior to joining Parthenon, Mr. Finley worked for Bain & Company as a consultant. Between Bain and Parthenon, he conducted a business turnaround as President of a manufacturing company in the custom wood products industry.
